message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
You had your chance, now it's my turn.
Bob, think about the long game. This offer is still better for you than waiting.
The value of money is decreasing for you, but not for me. You're running out of time.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
The value of money is still decreasing for you. You're losing more and more value each round. It's time to accept.
